plot outline: This story is a youthful romantic drama follows the life of a fearless youngster, whose lover becomes the obsession of an arrogant man, who wishes to possess her at any cost. Can the youngster find a way to protect his love against all odds?
title: Ek Bija Mate
plot: This story is a youthful romantic drama follows the life of a fearless youngster, whose lover becomes the obsession of an arrogant man, who wishes to possess her at any cost. Can the youngster find a way to protect his love against all odds?
